Name: Affinity
Ingredients: 30 ml Vermouth amaro - medium (e.g. Cocchi Vermouth Amaro)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A spirituous aperitivo-style cocktail, or an after-dinner sipper, which can be made with numerous different sweet vermouths or indeed a vermouth amaro as per our recipe. Equal parts produces a balanced drink but those after a more spirituous cocktail may want to up the Scotch a tad. Also, consider using a single malt Scotch - your choice could dramatically change this drink's profile.
History: Fashionable in the 1920s, the Affinity first appears in The New York Sun on Monday 28th October 1907.
Nutrition: One serving of Affinity contains 180 calories
